sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: This action serves to verify the integrity and correctness of a JSON request payload. It achieves this by ensuring that the payload contains the necessary and expected data in its body. Additionally, the action accepts inputs specifying the required fields to be validated against the body. In essence, it acts as a validation mechanism, confirming that incoming requests meet the specified criteria before proceeding with further processing.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Validate Request Payload
